value.title: Tesla Accused of Falsely Advertising Autopilot and Self-Driving Features
value.excerpt: Tesla has been accused of by California's Department of Motor Vehicles of falsely advertising in promoting its Autopilot and Full Self-Driving features as providing autonomous vehicle control. The DMV alleges the electric-carmaker misled customers with advertising language that exaggerated the technologies' capabilities.
